name: @scottlz0310/renovate-config
description: Centralized Renovate configuration for multi-language projects
author: scottlz0310

scripts.validate: npx renovate-config-validator default.json && for file in cpp.json csharp.json docker.json go.json nodejs.json python.json rust.json typescript.json automerge.json monorepo.json production.json schedule.json security.json; do echo "Validating $file..." && npx renovate-config-validator "$file"; done
